Parents should teach their children to be patient under injuries. Teach them that wonderful precept in the Lord's prayer that we are to forgive others as we would be forgiven. He who possesses the Spirit of Christ will never be weary of forgiving. I entreat you to be Bible Christians.--Manuscript 11, 1888. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. October 8, 1985 Entire manuscript
